pages.text: Airedale Terriers were originally bred for multiple purposes, such as hunting, retrieving, and bird flushing. They were also used as watchdogs.$(br2)Standing just under a block tall, these sturdy dogs come in three different coats.
These dogs are found most commonly in plains and windswept hills biomes. They can also be found in some savannas, and other windswept biomes.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Chicken Treat.
